oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Rhodes College
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: “Entrance to Southwestern, The College of the Mississippi Valley -- Memphis, Tenn.” Color image.

“Ms. J. M. Everitt -- 5737 Amelia Ave. -- St. Louis, MO. -- So glad to get your -- letter. Hope the cold -- is all gone. Plenty -- cold here. Will go -- home Sat. & write -- from there. Lots -- of love to all, -- Mary. -- Southwestern, the College of the Mississippi Valley. This is Memphis’ first college of liberal arts. Located on a beautiful wooded campus on North Parkway, opposite Overton Park, the buildings of vari-colored stone are among the first examples of college architecture in the United States.”
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Southwestern at Memphis; Rhodes College; colleges; education; universities;
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Natural Colour Post Card, Made in U.S.A
